name: Sacrificial Bow
title: Composed: Sacrificial Bow
desc: A ceremonial hunting bow that has seen the passage of many years. The trinkets on it are still visible.
inPlayDescription: The character deals +1 DMG.After the character uses an Elemental Skill: Create 1 Elemental Die of the same Elemental Type as this character. (Once per Round)

skills.desc: The character deals +1 DMG.After the character uses an Elemental Skill: Create 1 Elemental Die of the same Elemental Type as this character. (Once per Round)(Only Bow Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon)
